article_title: Peter B. Denison: Clinton will have to give to get Sanders' support
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: Froma Harrop says that Sen. Bernie Sanders should support Hillary Clinton ("Sanders can help Democrats soar," Commentary, May 11), but support has to go both ways. Sanders original purpose in running, I think, was to publicize the issues he is fighting for. He probably didn't expect to win.Then I guess he caught Potomac Fever. He should now concentrate on his issues and stop his attacks on Clinton.Clinton will have to accept at least some of his issues. She has rejected the $15 minimum wage
